nodes.text: Griwstrick was an unaligned terrestrial planet featuring patches of bamboos. It was situated in the Unknown Regions' Griwstrick system and constituted a part of the Rakatan Archipelago, a fragmented group of planets colonized by tribes of the Rakata species after the collapse of the Rakatan Infinite Empire around 25,200 BBY.

The Rakatan tribe that settled Griwstrick also brought guard animals there, including offshoots of the sand panther, a large feline predator native to the Core Worlds planet Corellia.  Due to overbreeding among the Griwstrick sand panther variant, however, the offshoots were mutated and no larger in size than scurriers, small creatures from the Outer Rim Territories world Tatooine. The sand panthers on Griwstrick inhabited the planet's bamboo-covered areas.
Griwstrick was introduced in the 2010 Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Roleplaying Game sourcebook The Unknown Regions.
